Reviews.Title: “best hotel in Rome! book it now!”

Reviews.Content: love elite hotel traveled 5 countries 11 days hotel top hotels weve stayed lobby super nice modern white furniture staff friendly thank claudia checked midnight housekeeper staff breakfast modern decor flat screen tv comfy bed basket fruits flower nice bathroom nice love lux soap attached wall instead bottles usually hotel housekeeper kept clean everyday card name housekeeper complain left chocolates brought housekeeper hopefully lol location close bernini station bernini square spanish di spagna trevi fountain shopping time rome highly recommend hotel book
